modularisation

Class ModuleNetworkDependencyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • modularisation.ModuleNetworkDependencyManager

  • public class ModuleNetworkDependencyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides functionality for establishing dependencies between ontology modules in an ontology network (of modules).
    Author:
    audunvennesland 10. jan. 2018

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createDependency(java.lang.String ontologyModule, java.lang.String ontologyModuleNetworkFolder)
      This method first establishes a list of classes (outlier classes) originally held by other ontologies (modules), then the method identifies which ontology is responsible for such an outlier class, before it automatically imports this ontology.
      private static void declareImportStatements(java.io.File inputOntology, java.lang.String importedOntology, java.io.File ontologyModuleNetworkFolder)
      Automatically creates import declarations from the input ontology to the ontologies being responsible for a set of outlier classes.

      Retrieves the set of outlier classes for an input ontology and returns them in a set

      Retrieves all OWL classes from all ontologies in the ontology network except for the ontology module provided as parameter.
      private static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getImports(java.io.File ontologyModuleFile, java.io.File ontologyModuleNetworkFolder)
      Returns a map of documentIRI and ontologyIRI for ontologies that should be imported by a single input ontology module

    • Method Detail

      • createDependency

        public static void createDependency(java.lang.String ontologyModule,
                                    java.lang.String ontologyModuleNetworkFolder)
                             throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException,
                                    org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyStorageException
        This method first establishes a list of classes (outlier classes) originally held by other ontologies (modules), then the method identifies which ontology is responsible for such an outlier class, before it automatically imports this ontology.
        Parameters:
        ontologyModule - The ontology module for which dependencies will be listed and imported
        ontologyModuleFolder - The folder holding the full set of ontology modules for this ontology network
        Throws:
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyStorageException

      • findOutliers

        private static java.util.Set<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass> findOutliers(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology inputOntology)
                                                                          throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
        Retrieves the set of outlier classes for an input ontology and returns them in a set
        Parameters:
        inputOntology - The ontology for which a set of outlier classes are retrieved
        Returns:
        A set of outlier classes
        Throws:
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException

      • declareImportStatements

        private static void declareImportStatements(java.io.File inputOntology,
                                            java.lang.String importedOntology,
                                            java.io.File ontologyModuleNetworkFolder)
                                     throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException,
                                            org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyStorageException
        Automatically creates import declarations from the input ontology to the ontologies being responsible for a set of outlier classes.
        Parameters:
        inputOntology - The OWL ontology in which import statements are declared.
        importedOntology -
        ontologyModuleNetworkFolder -
        Throws:
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyStorageException

        Returns a map of documentIRI and ontologyIRI for ontologies that should be imported by a single input ontology module

      • getAllOtherClasses

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllOtherClasses(java.io.File moduleFile,
                                                                                   java.io.File ontologyModuleNetworkFolder)
                                                                            throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
        Retrieves all OWL classes from all ontologies in the ontology network except for the ontology module provided as parameter.
        Parameters:
        moduleFile - The owl file for the ontology module
        ontologyModuleNetworkFolder - The folder holding all ontology modules in the ontology network
        Returns:
        A map where the key is the class name and the value is the ontology responsible for this class
        Throws:
        org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException
